ValidationRule.description: In order for onboarding status set to pending the agency IC must be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.Id = "0120g000000l3qD", NOT (ISBLANK ( Onboarding_Status_Set_to_Pending__c )), ISBLANK ( Agency_Implementation_Coordinator__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to have a value in the Agency Implementation Coordinator field
